A futuristic city built on water with self-sustaining systems and artificial intelligence that can adapt to the ever-changing ocean conditions. The city, named Aquaria, would be a marvel of engineering and a beacon of innovation. Its residents would live in harmony with the ocean, harnessing its power and resources to create a utopian society.

A world where gravity is not a constant, and people can manipulate it to their advantage. The ability to control gravity would be a highly sought-after skill, and those who possess it would be considered elite. The story follows a young girl who discovers she has the ability to manipulate gravity and must learn to control it in order to save the world from an impending disaster.

A society where memories can be transferred from one person to another, allowing people to experience the lives of others. The main character, a skilled memory thief, is hired to steal a powerful memory from a wealthy client, but soon finds themselves entangled in a web of deceit and conspiracy.

A post-apocalyptic world where humans have retreated to underground cities to escape the harsh environment. The story follows a group of survivors who must navigate the dangers of the surface world and uncover the secrets of their past in order to rebuild society.

A world where time is currency, and people trade years of their lives for material possessions and experiences. The main character, a time thief, must navigate the complex world of time traders and face the consequences of their actions in order to uncover the truth about their past and the mysterious forces controlling the time market.
